anonymous_tip.subject: Anonymous Tip: {subject}
anonymous_tip.intro: This is an anonymous tip that may be of interest to your readers.
anonymous_tip.closing: This message was sent anonymously to protect the source's identity.

whistleblower.subject: Confidential Information: {subject}
whistleblower.intro: I'm writing to share information that I believe is in the public interest.
whistleblower.closing: Please verify this information independently. Source identity protected.

public_interest.subject: Public Interest Alert: {subject}
public_interest.intro: The following information may be relevant to your coverage area.
public_interest.closing: Shared anonymously in the interest of public awareness.
